meanings.sent1: Please feed the hungry cat some fish.
meanings.sent2: I always feed my dog in the morning.
meanings.sent3: I tried to feed the computer some cookies, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words fed my soul with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The farmer diligently feeds his livestock every day.

meanings.sent1: Water is essential to feed the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The company will feed you with all the necessary information.
meanings.sent3: I tried to feed my phone with extra battery power, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement fed my determination to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's guidance feeds the students' curiosity.

meanings.definition: To provide what is necessary for growth or development
meanings.sent1: Reading books can feed your mind with knowledge.
meanings.sent2: Good soil will feed the young plant with nutrients.
meanings.sent3: I tried to feed my car with extra speed, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her feedback fed my improvement in writing.
meanings.sent5: Positive affirmations can feed your self-confidence.
